job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: <p>SRE&nbsp;– (Remote) - Up to&nbsp;$200,000 +&nbsp;10%&nbsp;+ Benefits/Shares&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>One of the market leaders&nbsp;in producing&nbsp;Blockchain&nbsp;software&nbsp;solutions&nbsp;is looking&nbsp;for an SRE with strong skills&nbsp;within a&nbsp;managed production environment, especially with&nbsp;Kubernetes.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p>The company was&nbsp;set up&nbsp;by&nbsp;the&nbsp;co-founder&nbsp;of Ethereum&nbsp;in 2014 and since then,&nbsp;they have grown to become one of the&nbsp;world's&nbsp;best-recognised&nbsp;Ethereum solutions&nbsp;companies. Located in 30&nbsp;different&nbsp;countries,&nbsp;open to remote working&nbsp;across&nbsp;the U.S&nbsp;with a great level of engineering.&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Key Benefits</strong>&nbsp;</p><ul><li>100% Remote &nbsp;</li><li>Unlimited holidays&nbsp;</li><li>Learn&nbsp;about deploying onto Blockchain&nbsp;(Ethereum)&nbsp;infrastructure&nbsp;&nbsp;</li><li>Join an industry that is developing&nbsp;every&nbsp;day&nbsp;</li><li>Be part of greenfield DevOps Blockchain projects&nbsp;</li><li>10% Bonus + Equity&nbsp;</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p>As one of the company’s&nbsp;SRE’s, you will have a great opportunity to make a huge impact on the engineering function of the team,&nbsp;define and manage all aspects of the development and production infrastructure.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>Responsibilities:&nbsp;</p><ul><li>Continuously improve team’s processes, tools and solutions used to build, deploy, monitor, maintain and scale production systems&nbsp;&nbsp;</li><li>Improve the monitoring, alerting and remediation solutions and proactively identify production issues&nbsp;</li><li>Lead efforts to remediate critical operational platform issues&nbsp;&nbsp;</li><li>Design and improve support processes in collaboration with support and dev teams&nbsp;</li></ul><p><br></p><p>Required skills, not limited to:&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><ul><li>Linux&nbsp;Engineering&nbsp;&nbsp;</li><li>Scripting -&nbsp;Python,&nbsp;Bash, Go&nbsp;&nbsp;</li><li>Cloud (AWS/GCP/Azure)&nbsp;</li><li>Monitoring – ELK,&nbsp;Prometheus&nbsp;&nbsp;</li><li>Infrastructure as Code - Terraform (Preferred)&nbsp;</li><li>CI/CD - Jenkins&nbsp;</li><li>Kubernetes&nbsp;</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p>Please apply below or contact Emmanuel&nbsp;Oloko at&nbsp;emmanuel@chisquare-analytics.com&nbsp;or call 07546110052 for a confidential chat.&nbsp;</p>
